sys_script_include.description: Customer extension point for AI tool execution. Extend this class to add custom tools.
sys_script_include.name: AIToolHandler

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d5016c3b831e32104d4fccb6feaad3a8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AIToolHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Customer extension point for AI tool execution. Extend this class to add custom tools.</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>AIToolHandler</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[/**
 * AIToolHandler - Customer extension point for AI tool execution
 * 
 * To add a custom tool:
 * 1. Create a record in u_ai_tool with the tool definition (name, description, parameters)
 * 2. Override the execute() method in this class to handle your custom tool
 * 
 * Example:
 * 
 *    execute: function(toolName, args, userId) {
 *        switch (toolName) {
 *            case 'my_custom_tool':
 *                return this.executeMyCustomTool(args);
 *            default:
 *                return global.AIToolHandlerSNC.prototype.execute.call(this, toolName, args, userId);
 *        }
 *    },
 *    
 *    executeMyCustomTool: function(args) {
 *        var gr = new GlideRecord('my_table');
 *        // ... your implementation
 *        return { success: true, data: result };
 *    }
 */
var AIToolHandler = Class.create();

AIToolHandler.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AIToolHandlerSNC, {
    
    // Override execute() here to add custom tools
    // execute: function(toolName, args, userId) {
    //     switch (toolName) {
    //         case 'my_custom_tool':
    //             return this.executeMyCustomTool(args);
    //         default:
    //             return global.AIToolHandlerSNC.prototype.execute.call(this, toolName, args, userId);
    //     }
    // },
    
    type: 'AIToolHandler'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-14 07:23:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5016c3b831e32104d4fccb6feaad3a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIToolHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d5016c3b831e32104d4fccb6feaad3a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-14 07:26:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
